subitem.label: Click on the help button (?) at the lower left part of the dialog and Confirm the help tray opens and is usable. Try Contents, search, bookmarks.
Close the tray and verify that clicking the help button (?) behaves the same way as pressing F1. Exit the preferences dialog.

item.title: Non resizeable dialogs
item.description: Open the preferences and go to the help/content page. Select the radio button to include help content from a remote infocenter and give it priority. Hit the new button which opens a small and non resizable dialog. Hit F1 in this Add new infocenter dialog. Check that help opens externally and not in a tray.

item.title: Short dialog
item.description: From the workbench menu select File/New/File and resize the dialog to make it short. The dialog should grow a bit to accommodate the tray, then go back to original size when the tray is closed.
